polarimeter/channel.documentation: Set of channels (lines-of-sight). Within polarimeter IDS: Polarimeter diagnostic.

polarimeter/channel/name.documentation: Short string identifier (unique for a given device). Within polarimeter IDS: Polarimeter diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight).

polarimeter/channel/description.documentation: Description, e.g. “channel viewing the upper divertor”. Within polarimeter IDS: Polarimeter diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight).

polarimeter/channel/line_of_sight.documentation: Description of the line of sight of the channel, defined by two points when the beam is not reflected, a third point is added to define the reflected beam path. Within polarimeter IDS: Polarimeter diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight).

polarimeter/channel/line_of_sight/first_.documentation: Position of the first point. Within polarimeter IDS: Polarimeter diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight). Within line_of_sight container: Description of the line of sight of the channel, defined by two points when the beam is not reflected, a third point is added to define the reflected beam path.

Major radius. Within polarimeter IDS: Polarimeter diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight). Within line_of_sight container: Description of the line of sight of the channel, defined by two points when the beam is not reflected, a third point is added to define the reflected beam path. Within first_point container: Position of the first point.

Toroidal angle (oriented counter-clockwise when viewing from above). Within polarimeter IDS: Polarimeter diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight). Within line_of_sight container: Description of the line of sight of the channel, defined by two points when the beam is not reflected, a third point is added to define the reflected beam path. Within first_point container: Position of the first point.

Height. Within polarimeter IDS: Polarimeter diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight). Within line_of_sight container: Description of the line of sight of the channel, defined by two points when the beam is not reflected, a third point is added to define the reflected beam path. Within first_point container: Position of the first point.

polarimeter/channel/line_of_sight/second.documentation: Position of the second point. Within polarimeter IDS: Polarimeter diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight). Within line_of_sight container: Description of the line of sight of the channel, defined by two points when the beam is not reflected, a third point is added to define the reflected beam path.

Major radius. Within polarimeter IDS: Polarimeter diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight). Within line_of_sight container: Description of the line of sight of the channel, defined by two points when the beam is not reflected, a third point is added to define the reflected beam path. Within second_point container: Position of the second point.

Toroidal angle (oriented counter-clockwise when viewing from above). Within polarimeter IDS: Polarimeter diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight). Within line_of_sight container: Description of the line of sight of the channel, defined by two points when the beam is not reflected, a third point is added to define the reflected beam path. Within second_point container: Position of the second point.

Height. Within polarimeter IDS: Polarimeter diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight). Within line_of_sight container: Description of the line of sight of the channel, defined by two points when the beam is not reflected, a third point is added to define the reflected beam path. Within second_point container: Position of the second point.

polarimeter/channel/line_of_sight/third_.documentation: Position of the third point. Within polarimeter IDS: Polarimeter diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight). Within line_of_sight container: Description of the line of sight of the channel, defined by two points when the beam is not reflected, a third point is added to define the reflected beam path.

Major radius. Within polarimeter IDS: Polarimeter diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight). Within line_of_sight container: Description of the line of sight of the channel, defined by two points when the beam is not reflected, a third point is added to define the reflected beam path. Within third_point container: Position of the third point.

Toroidal angle (oriented counter-clockwise when viewing from above). Within polarimeter IDS: Polarimeter diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight). Within line_of_sight container: Description of the line of sight of the channel, defined by two points when the beam is not reflected, a third point is added to define the reflected beam path. Within third_point container: Position of the third point.

Height. Within polarimeter IDS: Polarimeter diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight). Within line_of_sight container: Description of the line of sight of the channel, defined by two points when the beam is not reflected, a third point is added to define the reflected beam path. Within third_point container: Position of the third point.

polarimeter/channel/wavelength.documentation: Wavelength used for polarimetry. Within polarimeter IDS: Polarimeter diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight).

polarimeter/channel/polarization_initial.documentation: Initial polarization vector before entering the plasma. Within polarimeter IDS: Polarimeter diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight).

polarimeter/channel/ellipticity_initial.documentation: Initial ellipticity before entering the plasma. Within polarimeter IDS: Polarimeter diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight).

polarimeter/channel/faraday_angle.documentation: Faraday angle (variation of the Faraday angle induced by crossing the plasma). Within polarimeter IDS: Polarimeter diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight).

polarimeter/channel/faraday_angle/data.documentation: Data. Within polarimeter IDS: Polarimeter diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight). Within faraday_angle container: Faraday angle (variation of the Faraday angle induced by crossing the plasma).

polarimeter/channel/faraday_angle/validi.documentation: Indicator of the validity of the data for each time slice. 0: valid from automated processing, 1: valid and certified by the diagnostic RO; - 1 means problem identified in the data processing (request verification by the diagnostic RO), -2: invalid data, should not be used (values lower than -2 have a code-specific meaning detailing the origin of their invalidity). Within polarimeter IDS: Polarimeter diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight). Within faraday_angle container: Faraday angle (variation of the Faraday angle induced by crossing the plasma).

Indicator of the validity of the data for the whole acquisition period. 0: valid from automated processing, 1: valid and certified by the diagnostic RO; - 1 means problem identified in the data processing (request verification by the diagnostic RO), -2: invalid data, should not be used (values lower than -2 have a code-specific meaning detailing the origin of their invalidity). Within polarimeter IDS: Polarimeter diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight). Within faraday_angle container: Faraday angle (variation of the Faraday angle induced by crossing the plasma).

polarimeter/channel/faraday_angle/time.documentation: Time. Within polarimeter IDS: Polarimeter diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight). Within faraday_angle container: Faraday angle (variation of the Faraday angle induced by crossing the plasma).

polarimeter/channel/ellipticity.documentation: Ellipticity. Within polarimeter IDS: Polarimeter diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight).

polarimeter/channel/ellipticity/data.documentation: Data. Within polarimeter IDS: Polarimeter diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight). Within ellipticity container: Ellipticity.

polarimeter/channel/ellipticity/validity.documentation: Indicator of the validity of the data for each time slice. 0: valid from automated processing, 1: valid and certified by the diagnostic RO; - 1 means problem identified in the data processing (request verification by the diagnostic RO), -2: invalid data, should not be used (values lower than -2 have a code-specific meaning detailing the origin of their invalidity). Within polarimeter IDS: Polarimeter diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight). Within ellipticity container: Ellipticity.

Indicator of the validity of the data for the whole acquisition period. 0: valid from automated processing, 1: valid and certified by the diagnostic RO; - 1 means problem identified in the data processing (request verification by the diagnostic RO), -2: invalid data, should not be used (values lower than -2 have a code-specific meaning detailing the origin of their invalidity). Within polarimeter IDS: Polarimeter diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight). Within ellipticity container: Ellipticity.

polarimeter/channel/ellipticity/time.documentation: Time. Within polarimeter IDS: Polarimeter diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (lines-of-sight). Within ellipticity container: Ellipticity.

polarimeter/latency.documentation: Upper bound of the delay between physical information received by the detector and data available on the real-time (RT) network. Within polarimeter IDS: Polarimeter diagnostic.

polarimeter/time.documentation: Generic time. Within polarimeter IDS: Polarimeter diagnostic.
